page.title: 03N.TONBRIDGE : RADIO & BOOKS
page.content:
The information gathered showed that 74% read books regularly.Of this 74%, 26% were group A,8% were group B,18% were group C and 22% were group D. Group A read the least while group B read the most.The most popular type of book was a novel and the second most popular was humour. 72% of those interviewed listened to the radio regularly.Of this 72%,22% were group A,12% were group B,16% were group C and the rest were group D.The most popular radio station was Laser, the second was radio 4,then radio 2. 22% of those interviewed owned a computer.20% were of group A,the rest were of group C.10% of that 22% owned a BBC Computer;the next most popular computer was a Commodore 64.
{* For groups see page 2.
